4305270.name: Cozy Paradox Fixer: Twin Realities
4305270.description:
Cozy Paradox Fixer: Twin Realities is a cozy sci-fi puzzle mystery about comparing two versions of the same place.

Every level shows two parallel realities side by side in split-screen. You explore in first person through a compact 3D space (often a room or small area) where something doesn’t add up. Your job is to spot the paradoxes: objects or details that don’t match between realities.

How it plays

  • Explore both realities and compare what you see.

  • Identify paradoxes by careful observation (no timers, no rush).

  • Commit to a choice when you find one: you decide which reality’s version is the correct one.

  • When all paradoxes are resolved, you make a final Diagnosis: determine the underlying reason behind the anomalies.

The Diagnosis system

You won’t get instant “correct/incorrect” popups while playing. Instead, the game evaluates your decisions at the end of the level:

  • Your paradox resolutions

  • Your final Diagnosis (the root cause behind the anomalies)

  • A score that rewards precision and consistency

This makes each level feel like a real investigation: observe → decide → conclude.

Key features

  • Split-screen twin realities: compare two parallel versions of the same space in real time

  • First-person investigation focused on attention and detail

  • No timers: calm, cozy pacing: think, look, and deduce

  • Meaningful commitment: your decisions are locked in (no undo-spam)

  • End-of-level Diagnosis + scoring: replay for better ranks and perfect clears

  • Campaign structure: unlock new chapters, each with multiple levels

If you enjoy cozy mysteries, visual deduction, and satisfying “I knew it!” moments, step into the twin realities and fix the paradox.
